text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Low Profile. Swallows a Zombie as long as they are not Big or bigger, but has to digest it afterwards. Randomly spills Oil Tiles in a 3x3 area when not digesting; spills 3 after swallowing.
$(br)$(#bd951a)He ponders a lot, he is deep.

pages.title: ‚è≥ Contain Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Olive Pits drill into the ground and wait to consume Zombies that walk over them.
